entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 2:48 PM PST Saturday 07 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Dewpoint: 6.2°C
Wind: SSE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: A few showers. Temperature steady near 7.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6 except low plus 2 inland. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches inland overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near 6 except low plus 2 inland. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 6.
